title: Hierarchical Analysis Method Workshop for Early Childhood Gymnastics Education Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Early childhood education theory, basic statistical analysis, and educational assessment design experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course where current practitioners design and analyze assessment models using real educational field data

learning_goals: Learners can design an early childhood gymnastics competency evaluation model using the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP).
Learners can interpret the influence relationships between evaluation indicators through quantitative regression analysis.
Learners can establish a project-based assessment system based on real educational data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
